description:
You’ll love my apartment because of the light, the comfy beds, and the kitchen. It's a modern African experience. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers.

Relaxed environment in a family-owned building. Good heating, and views of neighborhood life.

You may use the kitchen to prepare meals and store items.  I will provide shelf access to store clothing in my bedroom and desk access. 

Fresh linen and towels are available in the closet.

I will be at the apartment from time to time, to sleep and check the mail.  

Guests will have the entire space available for use! I will also be available for suggestions, recommendations.

My neighborhood, Bedford Stuyvesant, is spirited with longtime and young residents, local restaurants, and coffeeshops.

You have train access with the C and G that can get you to other parts of Brooklyn and Manhattan within 30 minutes.
name: Apt with Modern Lights Available
review: The host canceled this reservation 4 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
